name: @itk-wasm/mean-squares-versor-registration
description: Illustrate the use of the VersorRigid3DTransform for 3D image registration.

scripts.build: npm run build:wasi && npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:bindgen:typescript
scripts.build:bindgen:typescript: itk-wasm bindgen --package-name @itk-wasm/mean-squares-versor-registration --package-description "Example 3D versor transform registration with a mean-squares similarity metric"
scripts.test: npm run test:wasi && npm run test:wasi:help && npm run test:emscripten

author: Matt McCormick <matt.mccormick@kitware.com>
